messages.message: cc @jtau / @Arek in particular -- would love to extend this in the future if cp/icc has any ideas :slightly_smiling_face:

Yes that!!
Right now we can pretty trivially link out based on any data we have present in the queries (which is limited currently, by design)

But if we can get spans or metrics or something from some of the runtime bits (ICC, argo, etc) that would enable some awesome extensions of drill-down behavior
Ah interesting yes, will keep this in mind
btw It seems I dont have access to see the linked dashboard. Is this expected?

We'll that won't do
lol Let me see what's happening
Weird, it didn't pick up the right defaults - @Arek try again?
